trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.DependencyObject" /> to which an element (Child) was either added or removed.
trans-unit.target: 已加入或移除項目 (子系) 的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.DependencyObject" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.DependencyObject" /> that was added to or removed from another element (Parent).
trans-unit.target: 已加入或從另一個項目 (父系) 或中移除的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.DependencyObject" />。

trans-unit.source: The index in the Parent element’s children where the Child element is located when the add or remove operation is complete.
trans-unit.target: 父項目之子系 (新增或移除作業完成時，子項目所在的位置) 的索引。

trans-unit.source: A value that indicates whether the Child element was added to another element (Parent) or removed.
trans-unit.target: 值，指出子項目已加入另一個項目 (父系) 或已被移除。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Diagnostics.VisualTreeChangeEventArgs" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Diagnostics.VisualTreeChangeEventArgs" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the Child element was added to another element (Parent) or removed.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，表示子項目已加入另一個項目 (父系) 或已移除。

trans-unit.source: An enumeration value that indicates whether the child element was Added or Removed.
trans-unit.target: 列舉值，指出子項目已加入或已被移除。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.DependencyObject" /> that was added to or removed from another element (Parent).
trans-unit.target: 取得已加入或已從另一個項目 (父系) 中移除的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.DependencyObject" />。

trans-unit.source: The element that was added to or removed from the Parent element.
trans-unit.target: 已加入或已從父元素中移除的項目。

trans-unit.source: Gets the index in the Parent element’s children where the Child element is located when the add or remove operation is complete.
trans-unit.target: 取得父項目之子系 (新增或移除作業完成時，子項目所在的位置) 的索引。

trans-unit.source: On a removal, this value will always be -1.
trans-unit.target: 在移除時，這個值一律為 -1。

trans-unit.source: The index in the Parent element’s children where the Child element is located when the add or remove operation is complete.
trans-unit.target: 父項目之子系 (新增或移除作業完成時，子項目所在的位置) 的索引。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.DependencyObject" /> to which an element (Child) was either added or removed.
trans-unit.target: 取得已加入或移除項目 (子系) 的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.DependencyObject" />。

trans-unit.source: The element to which the child element was either added or removed.
trans-unit.target: 已加入或移除子項目的項目。
